title: Speeding Over 1-14 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no more than 14 mph

title: Speeding Over 15-19 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 15 mph and no more than 19 mph

title: Speeding Over 20-25 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 20 mph and no more than 25 mph

title: Speeding Over 26-34 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 26 mph and no more than 34 mph

title: Speeding 35+ Over Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 35 mph

title: Failure To Yield
details: An individual who fails to adhere to a traffic control devices or move out the way upon the imediate approach of an authorized emergency vehicle making use of audible and visual signals

title: Reckless Driving
details: An individual who drives any vehicle with a wilful or wanton disregard for the safety of persons or property

title: Motor Vehicle Contest
details: An individual who drives any vehcile with intent to race a driver of another motor vehicle

title: Improper Lane Usage
details: An individual who drives any vehicle in the left lane wherin he or she crosses a double (non-dotted) line going into oncoming lanes of traffic or fails to maintain a single lane

title: Driving Without A Valid License
details: A individual who is in operation of a motor vehicle on a highway or public roadway while not carrying a valid license

title: Driving While License Suspended/Revoked
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle while their license is Suspended/Revoked

title: Driving Uder The Influence
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle while they are under the influence of alcohol or any drig/narcotic that would impair his/her own driving

title: Vehicle Registration
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle without the adequete registration for said vehicle

title: Vehicle Insurance
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle without the adequete insurance for said vehicle

title: Following Distance
details: An individual shall not follow another vehicle more closely than is reasonable, having regard for the speed of said vehicle and the traffic upon, and the condition of the roadway

title: Red Light Violation
details: An individual shall stop at a marked limit line when coming up to a steady circular red signal

title: Green Light Violation
details: An individual shall proceed straight through, turn right or left or make a U turn unless a posted sign prohibits them from doing when faced with a curcular green signal

title: Failure To Maintain Lanes
details: An individual should maintain lanes at all times and not mount the right hand edge or curb except when overtaking and passing another vehicle proceeding in the same direction

title: Impeding Traffic
details: No person shall bring a vehicle to a complete stop upon a highway or roadway so as to impede or block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic unless the stop is a necessary for safe operation or in compliance with the law

title: Unreasonably Slow
details: No person shall drive upon a highway or roadway at such a slow speed as to impede or block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic unless the reduced speed is necassary for safe operation, because of a grade, or in compliance with the law

title: Stop Sign Violations
details: The driver of any vehicle approaching a stop sign or pavement marking 'STOP' at the entrance to, or within, an intersection shall stop at a limit line

title: Parking Violations
details: No vehicle may park in a manner that obstructs a lane of traffic, entrance any footpath

title: Alchohol Bevrages In A Motor Vehicle
details: No driver shall drink any alcoholic beverage while in a vehicle upon a highway or roadway

title: Illegal U-Turn
details: No driver should perform a U-Turn unless a signs permits it

title: Failure To Drive On Right Side Of Roadway
details: An operator on a roadway of sufficient width sahll drive on the right half of the roadway unless a valid reason permits them to do so

title: Failure To Properly Display Headlights/Headlamps
details: A vehicle shall display each lighted lamp and illuminating device required by this chapter to be on the vehicle at nightime

title: Boating Under The influence
details: An individual is guilty if he/she operates a watercraft while under the influence of alcohol or any drug/narcotic that would impair his/her own driving

title: Flying Under The Influence
details: An individual is guilty if he/she operates a aircraft while under the influence of alcohol or any drug/narcotic that would impair his/her own driving

title: Distracted Driving
details: A person is guilty if he/she knowingly drives whilst distracted such as driving whilst using a mobile phone or without due care and attention

title: Hit And Run
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she gets into an accident and leaves the scene either in a motor vehicle or by other means

title: Seatbbelt Violation
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she does not wear a seatbelt whilst in a motor vehicle

title: Use Of Red/White Lighting
details: The use of Red/White lighting in a oscillating/rptating/flashing mannaer with the exception fo turn signals is prohibited if the vehicle is not goverment owned

title: Use Of Blue Lighting
details: The use of blue lighting in a oscillating/rptating/flashing mannaer with the exception fo turn signals is prohibited if the vehicle is not goverment owned

title: Use Of Yellow/Amber lighting
details: The use of yellow/amber lighting in a oscillating/rptating/flashing mannaer with the exception fo turn signals is prohibited if the vehicle is not used by state-authorized security agency

title: Impersonation of A Police Officer
details: A person who knowingly and falsely represents himself or herself to be a peace officer

title: Impersonation of A Police Officer While Carrying A Deadly Weapon
details: A person who knowingly and falsely represents himself or herself to be a peace officer while carrying a deadly weapon

title: 2nd Degree AggraImpersonation of A Police Officer
details: A person who knowingly and falsely represents himself or herself to be a peace officer in attempting or committing a felony

title: 1st Degree AggraImpersonation of A Police Officer
details: A person who knowingly and falsely represents himself or herself to be a peace officer of any jurisdiction in attempting or committing a forcible felony

title: Impersonation Of An Emergency Services Agent
details: A person who knowingly and falsely represents himself to be an emergency services worker of any jurisdictions in this state

title: Misuse of A Government Hotline
details: A person is guilty if he/she knowingly misuse the Government Hotline such as making false reports and/or prank calls

title: Prohibiion On Hunting
details: No person may hunt, capture, bait, attempt to hunt, capture, bait or lure any Domesticated animals and or farm animals this also includes dolphins, whales, sharks or stingrays

title: Hunting Permits
details: No person may hunt, capture, bait, attempt to hunt, capture, bait or lure wihtout a license a boar, coyote, crow, deer, fish, mountain lion, pigeon or rabbit

title: Hunting Hours
details: No person may hunt, capture, bait, attempt to hunt, capture, bait or lure any animals between the hours of sunset and sunrise

title: Hunting Methods
details: No person may have loaded weapon in their vehicle, pistols do not apply if they are carried legally and subject is in possession of a permit for conceal carry in the state of Los Santos

title: Hunting Under The Influence
details: No person may hunt, capture, bait, attempt to hunt, capture, bait or lure any animals while intoxicated

title: Poaching
details: A person who illegally takes, possesses, exports, imports, purchases, trades, barters, sells, or exchanges an animal, or any part of those animals for profit or for personal time

title: Assualt
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she makes a direct threat to inflict bodily harm on another person without the means of a deadly weapon

title: Aggravated Assualt
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she makes a direct threat to inflict bodily harm on another person with the means of a deadly weapon

title: Battery
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she makes a direct threat to inflict bodily harm on another person without the means of a deadly weapon

title: Aggravated Battery
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she makes a direct threat to inflict bodily harm on another person with the means of a deadly weapon

title: Involuntary Manslaughter (2nd Degree Manslaughter)
details: One commits the offense when he or she recklessly performs acts, whether lawful or unlawful, which are likely to cause death or great bodily harm, and which do cuase the death of an individual

title: Aggravated Involuntary Manslaughter (1st Degree Manslaughter)
details: One commits the offense when he or she recklessly performs acts, whether lawful or unlawful, which are likely to cause death or great bodily harm, and which do cause the death of an individual if 2 or more people are killed during the act

title: 2nd Degree Murder
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she killed an individual without lawful justification and either inted ti kill or do great bodily harm to that individual

title: 1st Degree Murder
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she intend to kill or do great bodily harm

title: Kidnapping
details: An individual is guilty of this section if he/she takes unlawfully by force another against their will

title: Illegal Dishcarge Of A Firearm
details: This section prohibits the discharge of any firearm of any sorts on public property, unless an authorized government official, certain circumstances will be given to cases where discharging a firearm was used in self-defense

title: Attempted Murder
details: Attempted murder is the failed or aborted attempt to murder another person
